extendedInfo.description: A simple flashlight application which fills the whole screen with a single color using maximum brightness.* Prevents screen from dimming out while running.* Option to flash screen on and off.* Option to send a SOS signal.* Option to change displayed color.Update 2010-06-23 (v1.3):* Add flash options.

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: This \"flashlight\" works pretty good. No problems at all, no ads, no ridiculous permissions. Its simple, you turn it on and you turn it off..LOL
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t get it.
reviews.comment: Really basic. You can\'t even control the brightness. You can\'t do special affects or anything. Don\'t get if you need special affects or dim light. Lame :\\
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good options & minimal permissions
reviews.comment: I am amazed how many permissions are requested by most of the relatively simple flashlight apps. This one does the job without all that and has the option for colored light.  Red light has less impact on your night vision and the colored lights also reduce the brightness.  I mostly use when coming to bed late where I want to be able to see enough not to stumble around but not be so bright as to awaken my wife.  Thus, the only thing I might change is to add a brightness control.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s difficult to think of a scenario where flashing morse code is helpful when you\'re carrying a cellphone; but, that feature is icing. Good job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good. Not bad for parties
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful and free!
reviews.comment: One of the best I could find that was free, didn\'t ask for every permission available, and has neat features.  Recommend +++

reviews.comment: Works perfectly on Hero. Nice small & clean app.

reviews.title: Simple and handy
reviews.comment: Simply puts screen at max. Useful without charging cpu or memory or network. No ads. No permisions needed.

reviews.comment: Very bright, even helped when my uncle needed to fix the car light at night
